Desc.entry: Andy Dressler is a CRB checked teacher and part of the Sheffield Music Service. Tutors in piano, keyboard and music theory. Suitable for all styles and levels of ability. Qualifications - GCLCM, PGCE and ABRSM. Offers all styles and levels including grades in classical and jazz. Home tuition available within 2 miles of S9, please enquire if further travel is required.
